entries.title: The best robots and AI innovations at CES 2023
entries.description: From mundane tools like lawn mowers to fantastical concept cars that get to know their drivers, just about every innovation showcased at CES 2023 was infused with AI.

entries.title: I just watched McDonald's next step into automation and why are you so mad about it?
entries.description: Are there certain times when automation in fast food simply makes sense?

entries.title: Delta Air Lines just showed United and American how to really please customers
entries.description: Sometimes, airlines do keep their promises, it seems. This will especially please quite a few business flyers.
